**[Recall Knowledge - Dragon](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)): DC 34 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29 [Bloom Wyvern](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2292) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 224 **Perception** +16; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet **Languages** [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +17, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +15 **Str** +6 **Dex** +3 **Con** +4 **Int** -2 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +0 --- **AC** 27 **Fort** +18 **Ref** +13 **Will** +16 **HP** 135 **Immunities** paralyzed, unconscious **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**Savage** **Trigger** A creature grabbed by the wyvern critically fails a skill check to Escape. **Effect** The wyvern makes a stinger Strike against the triggering creature. --- **Speed** 20 feet, fly 60 feet **Melee** fangs +20 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d12+9 piercing **Melee** claw +20, **Damage** 2d10+9 slashing plus Grab **Melee** stinger +18 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d8+9 piercing plus wyvern venom **Powerful Dive** ([Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) The wyvern Flies up to its fly Speed and must both move forward at least 20 feet and descend at least 10 feet. If it ends the movement within melee reach of at least one enemy its size or smaller, it can make a claw Strike against that enemy. If the claw hits, as a free action the wyvern can either automatically [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) the target or knock it [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). **Punishing Momentum** **Requirements** The wyvern **grabbed** a creature this turn using Powerful Dive. **Effect** The wyvern can Fly at half Speed while holding the creature in its claws, carrying that creature along with it and dropping it at the end of its movement. Alternatively, the wyvern can Strike the creature with its stinger with a +2 circumstance bonus. **Wyvern Poison** ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 26; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 5d6 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 6d6 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 3** 8d6 poison damage (1 round)
name: Bloom Wyvern
